title: ShinyD3 - A D3 warpper to Shiny App
text: can embed Shiny inputs outputs document. Outputs automatically updated whenever inputs change. demonstrates standard R plot can made interactive wrapping Shiny renderPlot function. selectInput sliderInput functions create input widgets used drive plot.

title: ShinyD3 - A D3 warpper to Shiny App
text: ’s also possible embed entire Shiny application within R Markdown document using shinyAppDir function. example embeds Shiny application located another directory: Note use height parameter determine much vertical space embedded application occupy. can also use shinyApp function define application inline rather external directory. R code chunks echo = FALSE attribute used. prevent R code within chunk rendering document alongside Shiny components.
